note: (he/him) Opinionated bleeding heart physician scientist (MD PhD) working on social & physical effects of trauma + TMS/TBS & ketamine. #MedicareForAll #Antifascist 🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️Ally #BLM Views=my own

fields.name: Current objectives
fields.value: 1. Fight misinformation with every tool we have! If all professionals jumped on all the trolls and misinformation posts we could ratio them all to nothingness. Please use your knowledge and speak up!

fields.name: Current objectives
fields.value: 2. We need general strikes not just for the workers and our families, but to reshape society to favor lives. Check out r/antiwork, r/workreform or r/solarpunk

fields.name: Current objectives
fields.value: 3. We need a general consensus mechanism visible to the public, e.g. each MD, PharmD, RN, DVM, etc gets a “soul token” (cf Buterin) and votes on public health measures, etc. This means a few talking heads favored by corporate media cannot both sides an ov
